data.text: @gameinformer Nerds of Earth go see this movie! You will absolutely have fun. It's different from the book and that's okay. It stands tall on it's own.

@gameinformer I liked it with all the flaws in the movie, but I have not read the book yet! 
I am very curious about the difference between the movie and the book. https://t.co/cPQBOtqPnW
